form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Minnesota Federal Savings and Loan Association, COPY

full_text: COPY Minnesota Federal SAVINGS LOAN AND ASSOCIATION MINNESOTA FEDERAL BLDG. MINNESOTA FEDERAL BLDG, MINNESOTA AT FOURTH MARQUETTE AT SIXTH ST. PAUL 1. MINN. MINNEAPOLIS 2. MINN. August 1, 1955 To whom it may Concern: Re: Maoling Liu and Thelme B. Liu This is to advise that Maoline Liu and Thelmo B. Liu opened an optional savings share account No 0 28107 of this association on December 9, 1947 in the amount of $639.20. The account has been active since that time, with an average balance of about $800.00. The balance as of June 30th, is $1,051.87. Our file alsc indicates that Thelma B. Liu is the Fee Owner of property described as Lots 16 & 17, Block 11, Ramsey Lockwood and others Addition to St. Anthony, this property being located at 630 Lincoln Street N. E. Minneapolis. This property was purchased in 1948 in the name of Maoling Liu and Thelma B. Liu and Mr. and Mrs. Wang. In 1951 Mr. and Mrs. Wang sold their half interest to Mr. and Mrs. Strangis and in 1954 the interest of the Strangis' was purchased by the Liu's and upon advice of their attorney the title was placed in Thelmo B. Liu alone, due to Mr. Liu's status as an alien, The original purchase price of this half interest for the Liu's vas $3,400 and in 1954 they purchased the interest of the Strangis' for $5,000. There is at present time a First Mortgage on this property with a remaining balance of $2,547.18. The evaluation of this property for mortgage purposes in 1951 was $5,750.00. Very truly yours, art Bean W. L. Beard Assistant Secretary
